page.title: 03A DAY IN MY LIFE,1985
page.content: I start the day by getting up at {8.00am.}I get washed and dressed and then I go down stairs for my breakfast.I get toast,tea and a bowl of cornflakes.After my breakfast I go to school.I usually have five minutes before the bell rings, so I play football with my friends. When the bell rings I go into the shelter and line up.Two teachers come out to take the classes in the school.I do maths,project work and language during the day.At{3.15pm}it is hometime.When I am home I get changed into my playing clothes.When I am changed I go to a football pitch and play football with my friends.At{5.30}I go home and get my tea.I watch T.V.until{10.30pm which is my normal bedtime.Then I go upstairs to wash and then brush my teeth.After that I clamber into my bed.
